item.description:
Distance: 15-20 miles however I'm open  ( + or _)depending on participants ability.

Duration : 2 hours

Difficulty : moderate to difficult there are some hilly sections.

This is so scenic the speed will be slower maybe 10-13 average overall. We will be stopping to "smell the roses".

By signing up for this event you and your guest if applicable are agreeing to the terms of the liabilty waiver below.

 This ride will start in the Adamsville section of Little Compton. We will head back down the hill into the village of Adamsville and do a loop into Westport MA. This is a beauftiful scenic ride  w/ water views and lovely homes. We will pass by Elephant rock beach and have a photo Op at the "fork in the road". We will then head back into Little Compton and depending on participants we can continue further into southern section of LC or head back to the cars. I hope you can join me for this truly beautiful ride.

Please make sure you have plenty of water and some snacks. Riders should be carrying a spare tube / patch kit and a pump, you never know!
